{"id":1182720233,"question_id":345,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1708581804,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1182720233/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"45.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String reverseVowels(String s) {\n        StringBuilder vowels = new StringBuilder();\n        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {\n            // Append vowels from string in sequence\n            if (c == 'a' || c == 'e' || c == 'i' || c == 'o' || c == 'u' ||\n                c == 'A' || c == 'E' || c == 'I' || c == 'O' || c == 'U') {\n                vowels.append(c);\n            }\n        }\n        vowels.reverse();\n        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();\n        int vowelIndex = 0;\n        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {\n            // If the character is a vowel, append the corresponding character from the reversed sequence\n            if (c == 'a' || c == 'e' || c == 'i' || c == 'o' || c == 'u' ||\n                c == 'A' || c == 'E' || c == 'I' || c == 'O' || c == 'U') {\n                result.append(vowels.charAt(vowelIndex));\n                vowelIndex++;\n            } else {\n                // If the character is not a vowel, append it as it is\n                result.append(c);\n            }\n        }\n        return result.toString();\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
